descriptions: No attempt to design or conduct an investigation; procedure is completely absent or irrelevant.
Investigation design is flawed; procedure lacks essential steps and controls.
Investigation design has significant weaknesses; procedure is unclear or missing some controls; data collection is incomplete.
Investigation design is adequate but could be improved; procedure is generally clear with some controls; data collection is mostly complete.
Well-designed investigation with a clear, logical procedure including appropriate controls; data collection is thorough and organized.
Exemplary investigation design demonstrating a deep understanding of experimental controls and variables; procedure is meticulously detailed and data collection is comprehensive.
No evidence presented or data misinterpreted.
Evidence is weak and does not support the claim; data interpretation is incorrect.
Evidence is limited and only partially supports the claim; data interpretation contains errors.
Evidence supports the claim with minor inconsistencies; data interpretation is generally accurate but lacks depth.
Strong evidence clearly supports the claim; data interpretation is accurate and insightful.
Compelling evidence provides strong support for the claim; sophisticated data interpretation demonstrates a comprehensive understanding.
Demonstrates no understanding of fields or their role in forces at a distance.
Shows a very limited understanding of fields and interactions; misconceptions are evident.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of fields but struggles to explain interactions.
Understands that fields mediate forces at a distance but explanation lacks clarity.
Clearly explains how fields mediate electric and magnetic forces at a distance.
Provides a comprehensive and nuanced explanation of fields, including their properties and effects on objects, relating it to real-world phenomena.
Fails to identify any cause and effect relationships related to fields and forces.
Identifies cause and effect relationships incorrectly or with significant flaws.
Identifies some cause and effect relationships, but explanation is superficial or incomplete.
Adequately describes cause and effect relationships related to fields and forces.
Clearly and accurately explains cause and effect relationships related to fields and forces, using evidence from the investigation.
Demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of cause and effect, predicting phenomena and explaining relationships with insightful detail and real-world examples.
